hiveArticle.title: White Flower
hiveArticle.body:
When I see a white color flower, the one thing which comes to my mind is the innocense and purity. The flower is so clean and pure that show how beautifulk is the nature around us.

![IMG_20180208_092551.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdyzjUMb5rezVB6joFRBTpgx5DGReTDyCyn9iEVE7tEZz/IMG_20180208_092551.jpg)
